title: Mthds & Apps Machine Learning
description: This course introduces the available methods in machine learning, which methods are better in what situations, objective functions and errors, and how to tune parameters.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 3133 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
